name: Sharpen
flavor: Sharpen the edge of a material.

purposeDescriptions.low: etching fluid that sharpens a target material as it evaporates
purposeDescriptions.mid: etching fluid that leaves a target material razor sharp as it evaporates
purposeDescriptions.high: etching fluid that leaves a target material nearly mono-molecularly sharp as it evaporates
purposeDescriptions.invLow: solvent that dulls blades into butter knives
purposeDescriptions.invMid: solvent that smooths and sands edges
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: solvent that renders any sharp edge cracked and dull as it evaporates
